results.title: Not worth worrying about
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. ” I found a mass at the top of my breast. My doctor assured me it was nothing to worry about, I trusted his opinion.”

results.title: Sent by God
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: the return from Egypt of Mary, Joseph and the Child; Jesus’ bar mitzvah in the synagogue; Jesus is lost and found among the doctor’s in the temple; John preaches at Jordan; the Zealots discuss John’s mission; Jesus is baptized by John; Andrew and Philip follow Jesus.

results.title: Further skills
results.creator_credit: Don Kelly and Gerard Holdsworth Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Judo”.
The object of the fourth film is to “sound off” the basic skills of judo. In this demonstration harai-goshi and uchi-mata are contrasted and tsurikomi-goshi - a blocking type of throw, some immobilisations, throws, and ankle-trips are illustrated.

results.title: Liberator of the oppressed
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: John being arrested at Jordan; Jesus being chased out of the synagogue; Jesus goes to the synagogue and cures the possessed boy; Jesus calls John to follow him; the miraculous catch of fish; Matthew the tax collector; the parables of the Kingdom.

results.title: Basic judo movements
results.creator_credit: Don Kelly, Gerard Holdsworth and Gerard Holdsworth Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Judo”.
The first film in this series examines the fundamental aspects of judo skills. The principle behind throwing and grappling skills are shown and the basic movements are illustrated by two kinds of throwing actions, Taitoshi and Ogoshi, and the immobilisation Kazure-Yokoshihogatame. Filmed at the Renshuden Judo Academy, London.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Kelly, Gerard Holdsworth and Gerard Holdsworth Productions

results.title: Born for us
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Joseph and Mary’s arrival in Bethlehem; the birth of Jesus; the census in Bethlehem; the gifts of the Magi; Herod’s rage and the killing of the Innocents and the flight to Egypt.

results.title: Counter attacks
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Judo”.
Having learnt the many techniques and the various factors which influence the way these techniques are used, the next stop is to learn how they can be linked. There are two main linking techniques - defensive and offensively; defensive linkage is known as countering. Counter take several forms, the value of which will depend largely upon the attitude of the person using them. Specific counters demonstrated are osoto-gaeshi, uchi-mata-gaeshi, an ippon-seoi-counter, waki-gatame and speed counters.
